RPC#

In development

Node#

class defichain.Node(user, password, url='127.0.0.1', port=8554, wallet_name='', wallet_path=None, wallet_password='', wallet_timeout=60, protocol='http')#

This is the main interface to communicate with your Defichain Node.

Set parameters as needed: just the user and password for your node are mandatory.

Parameters

  • user – (required) user witch is set in your defi.conf

  • password – (required) password witch is set in your defi.conf

  • url – (optional) the url or ip at which your node can be reached

  • port – (optional) the port at which your node can be reached

  • wallet_name – (optional) if your wallet is already imported, enter the name here

  • wallet_path – (optional) if your wallet is not imported you can specify the path here: it will be imported and becomes usable under the same parameter

  • wallet_password – (optional) password for wallet if it needs to be decrypted

  • wallet_timeout – (optional) time to elapse after the wallet is locked again

  • protocol – (optional) the protocol which is used for the request

decrypt_wallet(wallet_password, wallet_timeout)#

Decrypts wallet for a specific time if a password is given

Parameters

  • wallet_password – wallet password

  • wallet_timeout – time to elapse until wallet is locked again

load_wallet(wallet_path)#

Loads wallet into the Node

Parameters

wallet_path – Path where the wallet is located in the filesystem

test_connection()#

Tests Connection to Defichain Node and raises ServiceUnavailable Exception if no connection occurred

Accounts#

class defichain.node.Accounts(node)#
accounthistorycount(owner, no_rewards=None, token=None, txtype=None)#

Returns count of account history.

ownerstr

(required, string) Single account ID (CScript or address) or reserved words: “mine” - to list history for all owned accounts or “all” to list whole DB (default = “mine”)

no_rewardsbool

(optional, boolean) Filter out rewards

tokenstr

(optional, string) Filter by token

txtypestr

(optional, string) Filter by transaction type, supported letter from {CustomTxType}

int

(int) Count of account history

accounttoaccount(_from, to, inputs=None)#

Creates (and submits to local _node and network) a transfer transaction from the specified account to the specfied accounts.The first optional argument (may be empty array) is an array of specific UTXOs to spend.

_from :

(string, required) The defi address of sender

to :

(json object, required) The defi address is the key, the value is amount in amount@token format. If multiple tokens are to be transferred, specify an array [”amount1@t1”, “amount2@t2”] –> Can be build with “BuildToJson” Class from Utils

inputs :

(optional) A json array of json objects

str

The hex-encoded hash of broadcasted transaction

accounttoutxos(_from, to, inputs=None)#

Creates (and submits to local _node and network) a transfer transaction from the specified account to UTXOs. The third optional argument (may be empty array) is an array of specific UTXOs to spend.

_from: str

(string, required) The defi address of sender

to:

(string, required) The defi address is the key, the value is amount in amount@token format. Just to send DFI –> Can be build with “BuildToJson” Class from Utils

inputs:

(json array, optional) A json array of json objects

str

(string) The hex-encoded hash of broadcasted transaction
